title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1156.6 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1156.6 - Location

State Regulations

Requests for access to records of the authority and/or its
subsidiary corporations will be accepted and records will be produced for
inspection and/or copying at the Metropolitan Transportation Center, 181

Ellicott Street, Buffalo, New York during regular office hours on regular
working days. The records access officer may require that an employee be in
attendance during an applicant's review of the requested
records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1156.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
